summary.para: Creates an that virtualizes the sensor group. The term "device" in this context could refer to a physical device or a software media source. The source can represent a sensor group that actually contains multiple sensor devices, or it could contain only a single device, but still behaves as a sensor group.

param.name: ppSource
param.para: Receives a pointer to the created media source.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Retrieves the index of the default device in the sensor group.

param.name: pdwIndex
param.para: If the call succeeds, pdwIndex receives the index of the default device.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The sensor group has not been initialized.

remarks.para: The term "device" in this context could refer to a physical device, a custom media source, or a frame provider.
If this has not been called, the first device in the Sensor Group (i.e. index 0) will be returned.

summary.para: Gets the flags set for the sensor group.

param.name: pFlags
param.para: The flags set for the sensor group

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The sensor group has not been initialized.

remarks.para: Currently, no flags are defined for Sensor Groups.

summary.para: Gets the corresponding to a device in the sensor group.

param.name: dwIndex
param.para: The 0-based index of the device to be retrieved. The index must be between 0 and the value returned by - 1.

param.name: ppDevice
param.para: If the call is successful, ppDevice will contain the retrieved sensor device.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: the dwIndex parameter is not in the valid range.
The sensor group has not been initialized.

remarks.para: The term "device" in this context could refer to a physical device, a custom media source, or a frame provider.

summary.para: Gets the number of devices that are virtualized by the sensor group.

param.name: pdwCount
param.para: The number of devices in the sensor group.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The sensor group has not been initialized.

remarks.para: The term "device" in this context could refer to a physical device, a custom media source, or a frame provider.

summary.para: Gets the for the sensor group. The returned object is a live reference to the internal attribute store.

param.name: ppAttributes
param.para: The interface representing the internal attribute store of the sensor group.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The sensor group has not been initialized.

remarks.para: The caller may optionally use this attribute store to query for attributes set on the sensor group or modify/add attributes to the sensor group. Modification of this attribute set is not persisted and will only be valid for the instance of the .
This attribute store can be used to add runtime attributes for the that can be created using the method.

summary.para: Gets the symbolic link name of the sensor group.

param.name: SymbolicLink
param.para: Buffer of cchSymbolicLink characters where the symbolic link name will be written. The buffer must be large enough to account for the null terminator.

param.name: cchSymbolicLink
param.para: Number of characters available in SymbolicLink buffer.

param.name: pcchWritten
param.para: Output parameter containing the number of characters written to SymbolicLink. This includes the null terminator. If SymbolicLink is null and cchSymbolicLink is 0, pcchWritten will contain the number of characters needed (including the null terminator) to store the symbolic link name.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The buffer provided in the SymbolicLink parameter is not large enough to contain the symbolic link name, including the null terminator.
The sensor group has not been initialized.

summary.para: Configures one of the devices in the sensor group as the default device.

param.name: dwIndex
param.para: 0-based index of the device to be set as default. The index must be between 0 and the value returned by - 1.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: the dwIndex parameter is not in the valid range.
The sensor group has not been initialized.

remarks.para: The term "device" in this context could refer to a physical device, a custom media source, or a frame provider.
If this method is not called, the first device in the Sensor Group (i.e. the device with index 0) will be used.

summary.para: Represents a group of sensor devices from which an can be created. The term "device" in this context could refer to a physical device, a custom media source, or a frame provider. A sensor group may actually contain multiple sensor devices, or it could contain only a single device, but it still behaves as a sensor group.
